titles: An account of some of the travels and sufferings of that faithful servant of the Lord, Thomas Briggs and also several testimonies concerning his faithfulness to the Lord and diligence in his service till death.
author: Briggs, Thomas, ca. 1610-1685?
notes: Consists of autobiographical essay and a letter followed by tributes.
Testimonies signed: Deborah Barrow; John Kennerley; G.F.; and Thomas Robertson.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
